did.unittitle: Akron, Canton & Youngstown Railway Company Files,
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence of the Akron, Canton, and Youngstown Railway Company

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of correspondence of the Akron, Canton, and Youngstown Railway Company. Correspondents include the Brotherhood of Railroad Trainmen, National Mediation Board, employees, and prospective employees.

controlaccess.corpname: Akron, Canton and Youngstown Railroad Company.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Akron, Canton & Youngstown Railway Company Files #5516. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
